channel.title: Installing Ashita on Ashita v4 Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Installing Ashita on Ashita v4 Documentation

item.title: Configuring Ashita
item.description: This page is subject to change heavily in the future when Ashita v4 gains its full UI launcher. Once you have downloaded and extracted/installed Ashita, you are ready to begin configurations. Configuration File Locations Ashita includes its own built-in ConfigurationManager object which makes use of .ini files. To help keep things organized, all configuration files that make use of this system are stored in a central location, the /config/ folder.
